EmailTemplate.textOnly: - - - 90 Clean Clean false false false EN-US X-NONE X-NONE Hi Annamaria, So nice speaking with you today. Sapphire is now owned by Randstad which is a HUGE company. You should get pretty good results with them: http://technologies.randstadusa.com/jobseekers.aspx Good luck on your search and let me know if I can help in any way! Take care,Sara___________________________________SARA CONDEConsultant Services Advisor MBO Partners t: 703.793.6028f: 703.793.6068e: sconde@mbopartners.comw: www.mbopartners.com Notice: This email and any files transmitted with it are confidential. They are intended solely for the use of the individual addressed. If you have received this email in error please notify postmaster@mbopartners.com <http://technologies.randstadusa.com/jobseekers.aspx> and permanently delete the e-mail and files.
